name: Wolf
actions_desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
special_abilities_desc: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell. The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
description: Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue sold wolf hides for 8 gp a piece.[13] An Utter Eastern gray wolf. In the Utter East, packs of gray wolves were known to hunt and prey on weaker creatures, even humans and basal golems.[14]
caption: Wolves were canine pack hunters that were excellent trackers by scent. They were shrewd hunters and worked as a team, surrounding and tripping their prey. They were very common as companions for rangers and druids.
